Documentation for Win32lib v0.70.18
Table of Contents

Authors

A bit of background on the authors of this library.


David Cuny
David originally wrote Win32lib in an attempt to create a platform independant GUI add-on for Euphoria.

Matthew Lewis
Matthew implemented most of the common Windows controls

Derek Parnell
Derek has acted as custodian once David could no longer concentrate on the library. Since then he has reorganised the code and implemented improvements based on submissions from the many users of the library.

Christian Cuvier
Christian has been changing and repairing the library since 2006.
